controller

Class UserSessionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.UserSessionController

  • public class UserSessionController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as an user session. It stores logged in user details. It is constructed with the Singleton Design Pattern. This pattern involves a single class which is responsible to create an object while making sure that only single object gets created. This class provides a way to access its only object which can be accessed directly without need to instantiate the object of the class.
